3405.verse: فَإِذَا|And when|85|92|1730$رَكِبُواْ|they embark|102|116|13676$فِى|[in]|48|62|89$ٱلْفُلْكِ|the ship,|78|92|6502$دَعَوُاْ|they call|77|91|8084$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|67|184$مُخْلِصِينَ|(being) sincere|119|133|6352$لَهُ|to Him|62|69|1807$ٱلدِّينَ|(in) the religion.|126|137|1208$فَلَمَّا|But when|82|105|141$نَجَّـٰهُمْ|He delivers them|130|153|13677$إِلَى|to|53|76|118$ٱلْبَرِّ|the land,|79|102|5263$إِذَا|behold,|68|91|1370$هُمْ|they|50|61|49$يُشْرِكُونَ|associate partners (with Him)|216|216|7075$

3406.verse: لِيَكْفُرُواْ|So that they may deny|174|184|9992$بِمَآ|[in] what|81|101|43$ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمْ|We have given them,|161|181|1841$وَلِيَتَمَتَّعُواْ‌ۖ|and they may enjoy (themselves).|248|258|13678$فَسَوْفَ|But soon|85|320|3931$يَعْلَمُونَ|they will know.|119|354|115$

3407.verse: أَوَلَمْ|Do not|64|89|2346$يَرَوْاْ|they see|78|128|5421$أَنَّا|that We|74|124|4147$جَعَلْنَا|have made|92|142|1137$حَرَمًا|a Sanctuary|101|151|13486$ءَامِنًا|secure|68|93|1155$وَيُتَخَطَّفُ|while are being taken away|201|222|13679$ٱلنَّاسُ|the people|90|133|112$مِنْ حَوْلِهِمْ‌ۚ|around them?|121|164|13680$أَفَبِٱلْبَـٰطِلِ|Then do in the falsehood|185|206|10055$يُؤْمِنُونَ|they believe|101|139|35$وَبِنِعْمَةِ|and in (the) Favor|141|216|10056$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah|81|156|2$يَكْفُرُونَ|they disbelieve?|126|164|608$

3409.verse: وَٱلَّذِينَ|And those who|119|137|42$جَـٰهَدُواْ|strive|89|124|3318$فِينَا|for Us,|64|100|8576$لَنَهْدِيَنَّهُمْ|We will surely, guide them|193|228|13682$سُبُلَنَا‌ۚ|(to) Our ways.|118|136|9547$وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|144|713$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|146|184$لَمَعَ|surely (is) with|119|212|13683$ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ|the good-doers.|127|173|556$

3413.verse: فِى|Within|61|71|89$بِضْعِ|a few|69|88|13688$سِنِينَ‌ۗ|years.|70|89|9020$لِلَّهِ|For Allah|77|96|6$ٱلْأَمْرُ|(is) the command|136|155|5439$مِن قَبْلُ|before|92|111|250$وَمِنۢ بَعْدُ‌ۚ|and after.|105|115|13689$وَيَوْمَئِذٍ|And that day|107|201|13690$يَفْرَحُ|will rejoice|89|277|13691$ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ|the believers|113|207|2753$

3414.verse: بِنَصْرِ|With (the) help|121|129|13692$ٱللَّهِ‌ۚ|(of) Allah.|86|102|2$يَنصُرُ|He helps|79|95|13693$مَن|whom|58|74|76$يَشَآءُ‌ۖ|He wills.|74|90|867$وَهُوَ|And He|67|83|305$ٱلْعَزِيزُ|(is) the All-Mighty,|145|153|1187$ٱلرَّحِيمُ|the Most Merciful.|140|140|398$

3404.verse: And this worldly life is not but diversion and amusement. And indeed, the home of the Hereafter - that is the [eternal] life, if only they knew.

3405.verse: And when they board a ship, they supplicate Allah, sincere to Him in religion. But when He delivers them to the land, at once they associate others with Him

3406.verse: So that they will deny what We have granted them, and they will enjoy themselves. But they are going to know.

3407.verse: Have they not seen that We made [Makkah] a safe sanctuary, while people are being taken away all around them? Then in falsehood do they believe, and in the favor of Allah they disbelieve?

3408.verse: And who is more unjust than one who invents a lie about Allah or denies the truth when it has come to him? Is there not in Hell a [sufficient] residence for the disbelievers?

3409.verse: And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways. And indeed, Allah is with the doers of good.

3412.verse: In the nearest land. But they, after their defeat, will overcome.

3413.verse: Within three to nine years. To Allah belongs the command before and after. And that day the believers will rejoice

3414.verse: In the victory of Allah. He gives victory to whom He wills, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
